tooltip: Set which fsGroup is allowed in the pod security context.
description: This policy works by defining what `fsGroup` is allowed in the pod security context. `MustRunAs` and `MayRunAs` contain a list of ranges that define valid ranges for the `fsGroup` value. `RunAsAny` always accepts the request.
label: Service Type

tooltip: Valid user ID (UID) ranges for the fsGroup.
label: User ID Ranges
